column4: Hi all,,, I have been trying to ask on the samba channel, but no one is replying...
Is it normal to see huge performance difference between smbclient and smbfs? My smbclient is running around 10 times faster than smbfs
I have a 2nd hard drive that can't be seen by my server and I don't know how to get to it ( i dont even know if it can see it)
